## ginkgo-cli quic ping

Ping a QUIC server and expect pong

```
ginkgo-cli quic ping <addr> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                 help for ping
      --insecure             skip TLS verification for ping
      --server-name string   expected server name (SNI) for TLS verification; leave empty to skip verification
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   path to config file (yaml|toml)
```
